SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.events.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
VirtualController, Runnable, Remote
public class GameController extends Observable implements VirtualController, Runnable
GameController allows players to play a game. It handles all the game logic and checks that the player is performing legal operations.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController(Game game)
      Constructs a GameController that handles the provided game.

      By default, the game will be in LOBBY status.

      Parameters:
      game - the game you want to be controlled

  • Method Details

    • loadBackup

      public void loadBackup(GameBackup gameBackup)
      Load a game back so that the current GameController starts handling the loaded game.
      Parameters:
      gameBackup - GameBackup that contains the game's data and game's status

    • getBackup

      public GameBackup getBackup()
      Retrieves the game's backup.
      Returns:
      GameBackup object that describe the game's data and the game's state

    • addNewPlayer

      public void addNewPlayer(String nickname, ClientHandler clientHandler, GameControllerWrapper gameControllerWrapper)
      Add a new player to the game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the joining player
      clientHandler - the client handler of the joining player
      gameControllerWrapper - the remote object that wraps the GameController
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - if the game is already started

    • getGameStatus

      public GameStatus getGameStatus()
      Retrieves the current game status.
      Returns:
      the current game status.

    • getTurnStatus

      public TurnStatus getTurnStatus()
      Retrieves the current turn status.
      Returns:
      the current turn status.

    • forwardMessage

      public void forwardMessage(ClientMessage message)
      Put a message for this Game in a blocking queue. Messages are elaborated asynchronously on another thread.
      Parameters:
      message - the message that needs to be processed by this controller.

    • handleDisconnection

      public void handleDisconnection(ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Allows to let the game controller know that a player has disconnected. If the player was actually playing this game, the game controller will handle the disconnection. If the current number of online players is below the threshold, the game will be paused.
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - the ClientHandler of the disconnected player

    • handleReconnection

      public void handleReconnection(String nickname, ClientHandler clientHandler, GameControllerWrapper gameControllerWrapper)
      Allows to let the game controller know that a player that had previously disconnected, has now rejoined the game. If the player was actually playing this game and if they were actually disconnected, the game controller will handle the reconnection. If the game is currently paused and the number of online players reaches the threshold, the game can be unpaused.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player who is rejoining
      clientHandler - the ClientHandler of the player who is rejoining
      gameControllerWrapper - the remote object that contains a reference to the game controller
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the reconnection fails (either the player is unknown or the player is already online)

    • forceUpdateStatus

      public void forceUpdateStatus()
      Allows external users to (synchronously) update the game controller status

    • selectPrivateGoal

      public void selectPrivateGoal(String playerIdentifier, int index)
      Allows to select the private goal, among the available ones, for the specified player.

      This operation is only valid if the game is in GAME_CREATION status, if the player exists and if they haven't already selected their private goal.

      Specified by:
      selectPrivateGoal in interface VirtualController
      Parameters:
      playerIdentifier - the identifier of the player who is selecting the private goal.
      index - the index of the selected goal in the available ones.

    • placeStartCard

      public void placeStartCard(String playerIdentifier, boolean onBackSide)
      Allows to place the starting card, on a specific side, for the player.

      This operation is only valid if the game is in NORMAL_TURN status or in LAST_TURN status, if the player exists and if they haven't already placed their starting card.

      Specified by:
      placeStartCard in interface VirtualController
      Parameters:
      playerIdentifier - the identifier of the player who is placing the starting card.
      onBackSide - true if the starting card needs to be placed with the back side up, false otherwise.

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(String playerIdentifier, int index, boolean onBackSide, CardLocation location)
      Allows to place a card, on a specific side, in a player's board.

      This operation is only valid if the game is in NORMAL_TURN status or in LAST_TURN status, if the player exists, if it's their turn and if they haven't already placed a card in the current turn.

      Specified by:
      placeCard in interface VirtualController
      Parameters:
      playerIdentifier - the identifier of the player who is placing the card.
      index - the index of the card in the player's hand that needs to be placed.
      onBackSide - true if the starting card needs to be placed with the back side up, false otherwise.
      location - the CardLocation where the card needs to be placed in the player's board.

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(String playerIdentifier, int index)
      Allows to a player to pick up one of the visible cards or to draw from the decks.

      This operation is only valid if the game is in NORMAL_TURN status, if the player exists, if it's their turn and if they have already placed a card in the current turn.

      Specified by:
      drawCard in interface VirtualController
      Parameters:
      playerIdentifier - the identifier of player who is drawing.
      index - the index of the cards that the player wants to pick up.

    • selectColor

      public void selectColor(String playerIdentifier, PlayerColor color)
      Allows to a player to select their color.

      This operation is only valid if the game is in GAME_CREATION status, if the player exists and if the selected color is available

      Specified by:
      selectColor in interface VirtualController
      Parameters:
      playerIdentifier - the identifier of the player who is selecting a color
      color - the color selected by the player
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the player is u

    • sendChatMsg

      public void sendChatMsg(String playerIdentifier, String message, String addressee)
      Allow to put a message (sent by an authenticated player) in one of the game chats (public or private)
      Specified by:
      sendChatMsg in interface VirtualController
      Parameters:
      playerIdentifier - the string that the player received while joining/creating the game
      message - the message that the player want to send
      addressee - the nickname of the player that needs to receive this message, null for public messages

      public void run()
      Thread method that processes messages asynchronously.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • getPlayerByPlayerIdentifier

      public Player getPlayerByPlayerIdentifier(String playerIdentifier)
      Allows to retrieve a reference to the object of the player whose identifier is provided.
      Parameters:
      playerIdentifier - the identifier of the player whose object is required
      Returns:
      Player object of the requested player, null if the player isn't recognized within this game

    • isNicknameAvailable

      public boolean isNicknameAvailable(String nickname)
      Checks if a provided nickname is available for this game
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname that needs to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the nickname is available, false otherwise
